title: Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant - "Shubha Mangalya"
materials: Set with Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VS Clarity
G-H Color). Features a high-polish finish.
features: This exquisite mangalsutra pendant showcases a delicate floral and heart motif, seamlessly blending traditional South Indian sensibilities with a modern design. The pendant's openwork design allows for maximum light reflection, enhancing the brilliance of the diamonds. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail. Modern design that is perfect to add to any Mangalsutra.
occasions: Wedding Gift. Suitable for modern brides and women who appreciate subtle yet elegant pieces.
description: This diamond mangalsutra pendant is a symbol of enduring love and commitment. Its elegant design makes it a versatile piece that can be worn every day or on special occasions. Crafted with the highest quality materials and impeccable craftsmanship, it is a timeless treasure that will be cherished for generations. Diamond Clarity and cut are certified.
